org.miniauth.core

Class HttpMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miniauth.core.HttpMethod

  • public final class HttpMethod
extends Object
    Defines the HTTP method constants. Note that we use all-caps for the names (following the general convention).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DELETE 
      static String GET 
      static String HEAD 
      static String PATCH 
      static String POST 
      static String PUT 

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Converts the given method name to Upper case.

    • Method Detail

      • sanitizeName

        public static String sanitizeName(String method)
        Converts the given method name to Upper case.
        Parameters:
        method - Method name (but, not necessarily a method name constant, which should be all caps).
        Returns:
        the Method name constant.
